title: Economies of scale create market power

content.question: Which of the following can give a firm market power?

choices.label: Producing a standardized or homogeneous product
Lacking barriers to entry or exit
Having a large number of competitors in the market
Having economies of scale in production over the range of market output

content.answer: Having economies of scale in production over the range of market output

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe economic concepts, principles, or models.
